title: Box - Shield Insights
description: This dashboard highlights Box Shield security insights such as anomalies, policy violations, and threats, etc., for proactive risk management.

definition.content:
**[Box](https://www.box.com)** is a cloud-based file storage and collaboration platform that allows users to securely share, manage, and access files from anywhere.

This dashboard provides visibility into Box Shield insights, including threat detection, anomalous behavior, access policy violations, and data protection activities, etc. It helps strengthen security posture by highlighting potential risks.

**Note**: [Box Shield](https://www.box.com/shield) must be enabled on your Box Enterprise account to access security insights and threat detection data.

For more information, see the [Box Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/box/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
